error: public class Main { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello World" } }
fix: public class Main { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello World"); } }

error: public class Car { String brand; public Car(String b) { brand = b } }
fix: public class Car { String brand; public Car(String b) { brand = b; } }

error: public class Student { String name; int age; public Student(String name, int age) { this.name = name; this.age = age } }
fix: public class Student { String name; int age; public Student(String name, int age) { this.name = name; this.age = age; } }

error: public void printSum(int a, int b) { System.out.println(a + b }
fix: public void printSum(int a, int b) { System.out.println(a + b); }
